website_summaries.verdict: When you get serious about your solar cooking, this large and rugged option comes equipped with a lot of extras to take you to the next level.
pros: Includes a solar oven capable of 360-400 degree F temperatures, a dehydrating and baking rack set, 2 pots, and 2 loaf pans
Large size, fits most standard baking pans
Comes with instruction videos and a 600 recipe ebook
cons: Be sure to follow the directions and pre-clean it to avoid a chemical taste
Some reports that this oven arrives damaged, or missing pieces

customer_reviews.title: Best solar oven hands down
customer_reviews.text: This is an out of this world solar oven! It'll keep hot even on partly cloudy days. Did a ton of research before deciding on this. Not disappointed either. Expensive but well worth it. Made some banana bread on a partly cloudy day. The trick is to open the lid as little as possible while cooking. It is obviously well insulated. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Benedict

customer_reviews.title: the larger size is great, Still will not accept a normal 9x13 pan
customer_reviews.text: this Sun Oven is a replacement to a smaller one we have use for years. We live in AZ and cooking outdoors using the Sun is the way to go for us. the larger size is great, Still will not accept a normal 9x13 pan, disappointed. you can not get the pan into the oven because of the the rack holders on each side.
customer_reviews.author: D. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This oven works great. It cooks dried beans and peas, fresh vegetables, pasta and rice faster than on a stove top, and meat faster than in a regular oven. So be careful not to over cook your food! Still working on getting timing right for baked goods, but most turn out pretty good. I have found that baked goods cook more evenly if the size is small, like cupcakes or muffins rather than a whole cake. Love the feature to line up the angle of the sun; and the oven works much better if you actually use that feature. Unlike some other reviews, I've had no problems with quality or ease of use. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: FarmerPhyl

customer_reviews.title: It works well in the California sunshine
customer_reviews.text: I've used this Sun Oven several times since I received it. Today I made Pasta e Fagioli (see photo), a pasta and bean soup. Other than aligning the oven with the sun occasionally, this dish required no attention. I even used the oven to cook the pasta in the second of the two pans (they stack) that came with my oven. Here in SoCal there is plenty of sun for cooking. The Sun Oven is easy enough to use, although the leg in the back for tilting the oven toward the sun could have been designed better. I think the benefit I appreciate most is that I am cooking without fossil fuels. The sun's energy is clean and free.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis W. Viau

customer_reviews.title: This unit works great! We made beef stew twice and it took ...
customer_reviews.text: This unit works great! We made beef stew twice and it took 3.5 hours and the stove got up to 425 degrees. The only thing about the product and is difficult for us to do is take a picture of a damaged rack for the dehydrating. They will replace it if we send/email a picture free of charge. The only problem is we don't have the technology to do that. Otherwise, I highly recommend this product, because it works as stated and is great. Of course it is peak of the summertime, and we haven't used it in the winters sun, but I am sure it will work just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works well in so many levels
customer_reviews.text: I bought a basic Sun Oven over 25 years ago and am still using it. I got the new one for one of my friends. He loves the oven and tries to use it every weekend since he works long hours during the weekdays. We live in Arizona and by cooking outside, the heat stays outside. The interior of the house stays cooler and the A/C unit doesn't have to work so hard. The new features which include the thermometer, siting capability, cooking racks, and pans are great. I just wish they were included when I bought my oven decades ago!
customer_reviews.author: Bunni Greene

customer_reviews.title: Free energy!  Gotta love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I did the vinegar cleaning on it last week and then did a chicken yesterday. Sun is rare here in WNY at this time of the year, but the chicken came out GREAT! Was hoping to reduce what was left into soup today, but no sun! This oven will be VERY handy when we set out on our RV adventure throughout the USA later in the year!
customer_reviews.author: Swamplady51

customer_reviews.title: All American Sun Oven is GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great solar oven, Woud give 5 stars but T brace at highest setting makes the oven a little wobbly and could improve that design, Would also suggest 2 side handles as well but that aside, this is the BEST solar oven. I have another one that doesn't have the capacity and great options this one has. Temp climbs nicely and roasted a large turkey breast with no problem. Love the dehydrator trays and all that came with the package. Package came as expected. Another great plus is the sun indicators which take out the guess work on alignment...LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: prairiechic

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this cooker. It arrived almost immediately in perfect condition. The adjustable leg on the back and the shadow-eyes on the front make it extremely easy to keep this properly oriented. We've only cooked soups and roasts so far, and they were perfect. Although it is sturdily constructed, it is light enough for me (small, middle-aged woman) to carry it out and plop it in the sun and then quick clean up and return when done. Between this and the Solsource parabolic cooker we bought, I'm looking forward to not heating up the kitchen this summer. Plus, I know that we'll be able to cook and purify water in the event of emergencies.
customer_reviews.author: wkwebb

customer_reviews.title: Sun oven is great
customer_reviews.text: Great product.....everything came as promised, in excellent condition. I have already used it to make baked pasta with sausage, and it was good. I use the oven primarily to cook foods that require a lot of boiling, like beans. Dry beans get done within 3-4 hours in the sun oven and that keeps the smells and steam from the beans out of my house. My house stays cool and I don't have to constantly watch for a pot over boiling. The oven beats a slow cooker for this cause the slow cooker puts out a great deal of heat inside a kitchen. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Ismael Arvizu

customer_reviews.title: Pretty darn amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I am still trying to master the dehydration method, but everything else works as shown. I have cooked brownies, oatmeal, boiled water and a few more things to start testing and they are worked wonderfully. Everything it comes with, the hydrating shelves, pots, ect, is an added bonus to get you going almost out of the box. I highly recommend this because of the ease of use and the quality product. 4 stars only because 5 means perfect, that's a very rare rating for me... I "thought" I could make one, but not like this, do I am glad I bought. This could be a lifesaver...
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Works great - we cook in it often.
customer_reviews.text: Use this often to cook rice and eggs - Cooking now on Cloudy day takes more time, but gets to 250 and cooks a little longer. Dehydrated Tomatoes and it was great - very well made and I think it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good oven good company
customer_reviews.text: I gave it five stars because it works just as it should and the customer service was great when i received it with a cracked window and had to get a new one shipped. I have cooked almost every dinner for weeks with it. And have baked many types of bread with it. Its hot here in central CA and we get lots of sun but I still need to preheat for a longer time than suggested to get to 400 degrees (like 35 min.+). My favorite thing besides no fuel is my house isn't being heated up from baking or cooking dinner. Meaning good food all year with no worries and its portable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: we love our solar oven
customer_reviews.text: This oven is awesome. My wife and I purchased this for emergency prepedness. We tried it just to test it and now use it almost everyday, from drying fruits and herbs from our yard to baking bread, cookies as well as roasting nuts.will try to roast some meats as well. This is the best purchase we've made in a long time. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jose F. Pereira

customer_reviews.title: A must have for the desert southwest
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Heats up quicker than I expected. Accessories package was everything it was promised to be. Cons: The one cloud in the sky always seems to settle in while I use it. lol I would recommend for anyone with abundant sunshine.
customer_reviews.author: Coach

customer_reviews.title: Don't heat your kitchen, save electricity using the SUN!
customer_reviews.text: I bake bread at least once a week and find this oven a special treat by not having to heat my kitchen and causing my air conditioning to overwork. Anything you can cook in your normal oven can work in the Sun Oven. It does require your attention to keep it positioned in the sun. Banana bread baking in the photo attached.
customer_reviews.author: J. H.

customer_reviews.title: When removing food from solar oven, use hot pads. It’s amazing how hot it can get.
customer_reviews.text: Love the solar oven. I’ve cooked pot roast with potatoes and carrots. Also “boiled eggs” The draw back is having to readjust it it every hour to follow the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyday and emergencies cooking.
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I ordered this for two reasons, to cook using Mothers Natures energy and for emergencies. I haven't used it often yet, but look forward to using it more this spring and summer. We get rather breezy in CO Springs so I need to experiment with the right location to get the right sun, but protect it from the wind. It is very compact and has the perfect additions of pans etc. We plan on taking it camping with us the next time just my husband and I go.
customer_reviews.author: Grannie Libby

customer_reviews.title: Very cool oven. I was not overly optimistic about this
customer_reviews.text: Very cool oven. I was not overly optimistic about this, but it really does get hot enough to cook and relatively quick at that. Quality materials are used as well.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it's designed to do
customer_reviews.text: We have had our Sun Oven for a number of years now, and it has held up very well. There is a bit of corrosion on the handle hardware (due to my own carelessness in storage), but absolutely nothing functional has degraded. Highly recommended! Photos show a meatloaf and rice supper being prepared. Delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Clay McGehee

customer_reviews.title: Cook when there's a power failure
customer_reviews.text: This product is an oven. Mine pre-heats to 320 - 350 degrees. I recommend it to anyone who wants to bake without using electric or gas power.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hake

customer_reviews.title: Quick .... buy one!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this American made solar oven!!! I live in a camper & don't like my camper getting hot or having food odors in it. This is the solution.
customer_reviews.author: Mtn Walker

customer_reviews.title: loving it so far
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made and well packaged. I have, thus far, made apple crisp and a cornbread figuring if things went awry I'd start out with cheap ingredients, but both turned out great. Am looking forward to a long summer to learn how to do all sorts of things. Am glad I got the package with lots of accessories. Particularly looking forward to trying dehydrating and not having to run my big dehydrator quite so much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The CD that comes with it is irritating!
customer_reviews.text: Super irritated that the CD sent with the oven was so invasive into my computer. I couldn't access recipes until I downloaded all kinds of garbage that I don't want on my computer. Haven't even used the oven yet - I'm excited to but sheesh! - make the CD less invasive!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Very well built and easy to use. The quality of this oven is extremely good. I think anyone who buys this oven will be very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: David W. Jones

customer_reviews.title: The All American Sun Oven is amazing. It cooks a whole chicken in just over ...
customer_reviews.text: The All American Sun Oven is amazing. It cooks a whole chicken in just over the same amount of time your kitchen oven would. My wife loves cooking two dozen eggs for Easter egg painting in very short order. If the power goes down and you have sunlight, you will not regret buying this high quality unit. The cooking pans and dehydrating racks are a perfect match for the Sun Oven.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry M. Nix

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I haven't cooked anything yet but it comes with all the information on how to take care of it and a recipe book.
customer_reviews.author: MR Cook

customer_reviews.title: light weight and works like a real oven
customer_reviews.text: What can I say about the All American solar oven that has not already been said? I will add it is extremely well built, light weight and works like a real oven. I actually bought two of them to allow bigger meals when needed :)
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Slaton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for 2 years now, and this year the white handles that are used to determine the sun location for best heating, have fallen off. The glue on the glass is deterioration. Would like to know what glue to use to reapply the handles/sun light indicators.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Overall an excellent product and Inventions like this one literally save lives, this is how cooking should be. As human beings we should get into the routine of eating during the day and what better way to do it with than the power of the sun!
customer_reviews.author: Daeshon Jones

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for over a year now. I am on net metering. so I don't use power from 12 to 6pm. have cooked and baked, mostly cookie and corn bread. winter months 340f and summer over 380. I am very pleased with this purchase. I am still using the pots and racks that came with it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael F.

customer_reviews.title: This a great tool to have for hot summer days when you ...
customer_reviews.text: This a great tool to have for hot summer days when you want something other than salad or sandwiches, and in case of a blackout, this is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: D. Elmore

customer_reviews.title: Oven is a nice addition
customer_reviews.text: We have used this oven once and it is great. It takes a little time to figure out cooking times but if the electricity goes out we can still bake.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this thing
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this thing!! Had it only a week or 2 & I have made chicken & rice, meatloaf, pork chops, & cherry pie so far. Everything has turned out fantastic! Reaches 350 degrees + in no time! Worth every penny!! I'm thinking of buying a second one so I can cook meat in one & potatoes & veggies in the other. No need for a cook stove unless it's cloudy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waiting for the sun!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the solar oven as a gift, and it was received with fanfairs. Unfurtunately the Seattle weather has not cooperated but as soon as my friend cooks with it I will posted. I was not aware that he wanted this particular model so I am happy that I did my research.
customer_reviews.author: Syl

customer_reviews.title: I expect it will do the same excellent job of cooking as the previous unit
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for an older unit I lost in a house fire. I haven't used it yet but it appears to have more room inside. I expect it will do the same excellent job of cooking as the previous unit, which handled roasts, soups and hardboiled eggs with no problems. It's a fun way to cook, especially if you need to be outside on a sunny day for yard work or gardening.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Preparedness product.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Preparedness product. No gas, No electricity? This is what you will need. Proven by many to cook meals great. Recommended by others in my church after they used it themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen J Mauk

customer_reviews.title: We love this oven so much my kids are getting one ...
customer_reviews.text: We love this oven so much my kids are getting one for Christmas. They are simple to use and my husband even cooked dinner in for it tonight!
customer_reviews.author: Templeladee

customer_reviews.title: Great oven
customer_reviews.text: This thing great. Wanted one forever. It's great when your camping.
customer_reviews.author: Shopmom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Made bread, turned out great It does take some experimenting, but very happy with this oven.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Sparger

customer_reviews.title: sun oven
customer_reviews.text: works great we used it on our camping trip in rim country AZ at 7000 ft we made chicken and rice real easy to use and simple to clean
customer_reviews.author: paul gilbert

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE all the accessories that came with it & it ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Sun oven, I purchased this one because it is a little bigger than the original Global Sun Oven. I LOVE all the accessories that came with it & it is a great price! The larger size & all the accessories allow me to cook more at once for my large family without using any electricity, no heating the house in the hot summer, then using even more electricity (A/C) to cool it back down, plus less environmental impact!!! Win-WIN!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lasagirl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very helpful for people in need on way to Africa. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Titi

customer_reviews.title: Product damage
customer_reviews.text: The product was damaged inside the oven from the dehydration racks.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Great product......everything came as promised, in excellent condition. I have already used it & everything was a success.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: SUPERIOR PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: WE HAVE USED OUR SUN OVEN SEVERAL TIMES NOW. IT IS WELL MADE AND SHOULD LAST A LONG TIME. WE HAVE MADE BREAD AND COOKED BEANS IN IT SO FAR WITH GREAT RESULTS. WE ARE VERY SATISFIED WITH OUR OVEN AND WOULD RECOMMEND IT TO ANYONE WANTING TO COOK OUTDOORS WITH SUNLIGHT.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: A+ worth every penny!! High quality,easy to use,self leveling rack!
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is so much better than described. Made very well!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great Package Oven
customer_reviews.text: It was shipped very fast packed well and is actually nicer than we expected it to be , getting it with the included accessories is nice
customer_reviews.author: Tod Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great device. Works well.
customer_reviews.text: 8ve tried several recipes. The sun always seems to go away when I use this! But it does its job very well. It heats up very hot. Downside is carrying it with food in it. Also it's pretty big and bulky. Trying to find a storage place for it, yet needs to be where I'll use it.
customer_reviews.author: Mountainlady

customer_reviews.title: Works here even in winter !
customer_reviews.text: Baked some bread and cakes here in central Chile, even in winter !
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sun Oven
customer_reviews.text: It works wonderfully. We have made banana bread and several meals already and they all turned out awesome. It heats up very fast in full sun, and it is very easy to use. We even used it to make yogurt over night. It worked great. We love it. Now if we only could get more sun here in MN!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: as long as you follow the directions..
customer_reviews.text: as long as you follow the directions..IF THE cake your cooking is very moist it could take another 1 hour longer
customer_reviews.author: LORETTA THOMPSON

customer_reviews.title: Even I  can Cook.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful Sun Oven. Only one issue: i.e. The oven opener came off, but I put it back on and it stayed without any additional glue.
customer_reviews.author: Pastor Leo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fine. Works like a champ. Quality built. It's the one you want for solar cooking.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked. Bread baked in this San oven is very delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The sun oven has been great. Just yesterday late in the afternoon around 5pm
customer_reviews.text: The sun oven has been great. Just yesterday late in the afternoon around 5pm, I used the Sun Oven to heat up some ribs and the Sun Oven easily maintained 300 degrees and the ribs were great.
customer_reviews.author: James E. Schoffstall

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: amazing, cooked beans from dry without soaking to too done, in the mid to late afternoon and I forgot to move the oven regularly. faster than on the stove in the house. dried fruit delightfully. did have a little trouble getting it to be tilted enough for the sun on the lower horizon since it's fall. looking forward to trying it some more, does require you to be around, or fenced yard to protect it from the dog.
customer_reviews.author: Susan A

customer_reviews.title: Don't trust this vendor!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the "All American SUN OVEN with Dehydrating and Preparedness Accessory Package" but only received the Sun Oven... none of the extra Dehydrating and Accessory package. This is the second unit for our family so we know what was supposed to be in there. We gave this as a gift. The recipient (our Dad) unsealed it for the first time last weekend excited to use it and discovered items missing. Very disappointed in this vendor. Oven itself it great. Vendor is not.
customer_reviews.author: Clark

customer_reviews.title: Take this Antifa, for humanity.
customer_reviews.text: Made cookies, on a partly cloudy day, too good to safe for the grandchildren, wow, a just in case way to cook. I'm glad they have been so involved in Africa. All of us need to get involved in this means to cook, bake and pasteurize water for the sake of humanity. If a small portion of a purchase is to go towards assisting the starving internationally buy one even if you never use it. If you find an organization who provides these to sub Sahara Africa donate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sun Oven
customer_reviews.text: We love it! Have cooked an baked so any things. Even put it on FB. Saves gas an the house from heating up. Can't wait to take it camping. Next door neighbor has one an uses her more with 4 kids an always on the go. She let me try her's one day for meat loaf an I was hooked. I have recommended it to many people.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Sandy

customer_reviews.title: what I got ain't what is pictured...
customer_reviews.text: Just received the sun oven in the mail. The one I received is black and the one in the picture is blue. So now I am unsure if I received the New model or an old model. I will have to research to find out..... Revision: It is in fact the newer model and it is the most AMAZING item I have ever purchased. Buy one or two, you will be happy with yourself that you did....
customer_reviews.author: wade shockley

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with it. It has performed as advertised. It is easy to use. No problem with noxious odors. Cleaned it as directions specified.
customer_reviews.author: Earle Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: All American Sun Oven w/Dehydrating and Accesories Package
customer_reviews.text: I have been very pleased with the All American Sun Oven w/Dehydrating and Accessories Package. The Sun Oven is easy to use, and the food cooked in it is delicious. I especially like the cookware included with the accessories package. It's size is just right for our family, and I like the way it can go from oven to table to refrigerator as needed. I have not used the dehydrating racks yet, but am looking forward to it. The bread pans included in the accessories package are of an amazing quality, and are perfect for cooking meatloaf and breads.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor F. Key

customer_reviews.title: All American Sun Oven
customer_reviews.text: Greatest invention ever. Never thought this would work but it does. Love this set because of the accessories that come with it. You have absolutely everything you need to be successful.
customer_reviews.author: CPK

customer_reviews.title: Great thing to have just in case.
customer_reviews.text: The Sun oven performed as advertised. We have made several meals and baked bread in it. I'm sure that it will be there for us when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE this oven
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this oven. It goes beyond being an oven and does everything well. I waited a long time to be able purchase it and it is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Finlay

customer_reviews.title: Great oven!
customer_reviews.text: We haven't actually used this yet! We have cooked in one similar to this one! But I did open it and look at it! Made really well. Don't be afraid to order it!!! It's a great made product!!!
customer_reviews.author: nanapam

customer_reviews.title: Holy cow this is an awesome product! I promptly baked brownies and beans and ...
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow this is an awesome product! I promptly baked brownies and beans and rice (not at the same time) I couldn't believe how easy and fabulous this was!
customer_reviews.author: jenn

customer_reviews.title: Love the Oven but...
customer_reviews.text: I find the oven easy to use and it worked very well the one time I've had it on a camp out. My only slight negative is that I found the identical package in a bookstore in Bisbee, and it was about $60 less expensive. I should have shopped locally first.
customer_reviews.author: Galen Pearce

customer_reviews.title: Terrific sun oven and accessory items
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic item that works great! Simple to setup and use; thank you SO much for this terrific technology.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, arrived fast in excellent condition. Now if it will quit raining every weekend I'll try it out, I can't wait.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great so far. with the panels extended, It is a little awkward to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well built, well packaged!
customer_reviews.text: Shipped Timely, and good quality workmanship! Very pleased with the oven, and look forward to trying lots of meals this summer!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte A. Coombes

customer_reviews.title: the oven itself works fine.
customer_reviews.text: Item came with one of the pots heaily damaged. the oven itself works fine.
customer_reviews.author: G. Nonimouse

customer_reviews.title: No recipes included
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the construction and the cookware that came with it. Both the box and the product description stated it included a recipe CD. It was not included and the seller was not able to provide it. The online recipes look great, but they are not in a very printable format. If one reason to buy this oven is to cook during power failure, an online cookbook doesn't help much.
customer_reviews.author: RKC

customer_reviews.title: It looks very sturdy. The guides are quite helpful and the fact ...
customer_reviews.text: Unable to give 5 as I have not yet used it. It has been raining non stop here for the past week in a half! I'm excited about getting started though. It looks very sturdy. The guides are quite helpful and the fact that it comes with utilities makes it great. I'll get back in hopes of giving it a 5 once I've used it!
customer_reviews.author: JR Account

product_meta.title: All American Sun Oven Dehydrating and Preparedness Accessory Package
product_meta.description: All American SUN OVEN For the past 28 years, SUN OVENS have been widely used around the world in more than 126 countries and have become the world's most well-respected solar cooking appliance. The TOTALLY NEW All American SUN OVEN combines the experience gained by cooking millions of meals with the distinctive American cooking needs and lifestyle to create a uniquely American SUN OVEN which: -Is 20% larger than prior model SUN OVENS to cook a greater volume of food and accommodate many standard size baking pans. -Takes the guesswork out of aligning with the sun. -Has improved wind resistance. -Boosts temperatures by 15% over prior models to cook more food in less time. -Includes CD with hundreds of recipes& Emergency Preparedness Organizer CD and videos. The TOTALLY NEW All American SUN OVEN helps you harness the power of the sun. One source of power that never fails is the light of the sun. Whether you're dealing with a power outage or conserving energy, it lets you harness the power of the sun to cook without fuel. The TOTALLY NEW All American SUN OVEN ...Lets You Create Your Favorite Recipes You can cook almost anything - breads, cakes, muffins, pizza, vegetables, poultry, fish, meats, casseroles, grains, pasta, and desserts, just to name a few. ...Provides High Cooking Temperatures Reach temperatures of 360 to 400 degrees Fahrenheit, which are more than sufficient to bake, boil, or steam your favorite foods. ...You Choose The Cooking Time: Fast or Slow Cooks within 20 minutes of conventional oven or stove top time, or lets you slow cook all day. ...Is Ruggedly Built It is a serious appliance that is made for years of trouble-free use.
feature_bullets: Save money and be prepared with the world's most well-respected solar cooking appliance. Use at home or for emergency preparedness.
Includes: Lightweight, portable solar oven that reaches 360-400 degrees
Includes: Dehydrating & Baking Rack Set, 2 Easy Stack Pots w/ lids, 2 Loaf Pans & one Multi-Fuel Water Pasteurizing Indicator
Comes with the Sun Oven Cookbook
